name: Kotak 811 Savings Account

"Wow! Loving the Kotak811 zero balance account. They offer free & fast fund transfer option as well"
Looking for a hassle-free way to save and manage your money? Open Kotak811 zero balance savings account gives you the flexibility to bank on your terms. Here are a host of benefits you can enjoy:
1. Experience zero balance freedom: Save at your pace with no minimum balance requirement—no penalties, just convenience.
